summary: The diff adds a new PersonalPhotoFrame component with loading/error UI and wires it into ValentineProposalPage, but it points to a different image URL than the required fixed static asset path and provides no evidence that the required asset is made available at build/deploy under /assets/generated/.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the personal photo renders using the existing public URL path /assets/generated/personal-photo.dim_1600x1600.png and ensure build/deploy asset availability so the request returns HTTP 200 with no related console errors.
missing_requirements.reason: The new component hardcodes a different URL (a WhatsApp JPEG path) instead of the required /assets/generated/personal-photo.dim_1600x1600.png. The diff also shows no added/copied static asset or configuration change that would ensure /assets/generated/personal-photo.dim_1600x1600.png is present and served (HTTP 200) after build/deploy.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed the personal photo asset reference to a different URL ('/assets/WhatsApp Image 2026-02-10 at 00.43.36.jpeg') instead of keeping the mandated static asset path '/assets/generated/personal-photo.dim_1600x1600.png'.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly constrains the personal photo to remain a static frontend asset referenced by the existing public URL path /assets/generated/personal-photo.dim_1600x1600.png; the diff introduces a different path.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a loading spinner/"Loading photo..." state before the image loads.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-2 asks for an error fallback if the image cannot load, but does not request a loading state/spinner; this is additional UI behavior beyond the specified requirements.
